playlist

Class Playlist

  • Object
    • Playlist
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    XMLSerialisable

    public class Playlist
extends Object
implements XMLSerialisable
    A playlist determines which tracks form a chart, which position each is in, and acoompanying text and GFX to display Playlist is serialisable to and from disk - see XMLReader XMLWriter
    Author:
    tony
